meanings.definition: To take part in or participate in something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys partaking in sports activities with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The whole family loves partaking in the annual picnic at the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed interested in partaking in the game of chase with the dog.
meanings.sent4: The students were actively partaking in the discussion, sharing their ideas.
meanings.sent5: Partaking in the dance competition brought her great joy and excitement.

meanings.sent1: They always partake in the delicious meals prepared by their grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The siblings happily partake in the responsibility of caring for their pet hamster.
meanings.sent3: The birds in the garden often partake in the crumbs left by the picnic-goers.
meanings.sent4: The community members partake in the festivities by decorating the town square.
meanings.sent5: Partaking in the success of the team made him feel proud and accomplished.
